attributes.action: Stop the Jewish Holocaust Memorial being Hijacked By Others
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Prime Minister the Jewish Holocaust Memorial is very Special.
In the history of Mankind , nothing can surpass the cruelty and savagery of the Perpetrators.
Nor can the terrible silence of Government Leaders and people in positions of power , whom knew that the Jewish people in these Inhuman Concecration Camps , suffered great cruelty , so much so Death was Welcomed , be easily forgiven.
Please no more talk of others.
"Yes", others suffered Catholic Priests , Dissenters , Undesirables , homosexuals and more.
The Jews had been the target for total destruction , it did not matter if being a homosexual , athiest , believer or otherwise as long as you in the main belonged to the Jews.
